author: ekoneil
msg: The ControlBeanContextFactory can be used to allow control containers to add a custom implementation of a ControlBean's ControlBeanContext.  This allows additional functionality to be exposed to ControlBean(s).

author: ekoneil
msg: Minor cleanup -- no real code changes.

author: kmarsden
msg: DERBY-125 Network Server can send DSS greater than 32K to client, which breaks DRDA protocol.
Fixes off by one error during segment shifting.
Fixes continuation flag handling to not overwrite the length.
See changes.html attached to DERBY-125 for more info

author: andreas
msg: Fixed BXE resource paths in blog publication

msg: Bug LOGCXX-120: Wrong parameter description in PatternLayout
